com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters

Class LiBaseRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LiBrowseAdapter, LiConversationAdapter, LiMessageListAdapter

    public abstract class LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
extends <any>
    RecyclerView.Adapter that is common to sdk fragments This adapter is used where ever we want to show a list of items
